description:
The ultimate backyard staple. A thick, flame-grilled beef patty served on a toasted brioche bun with crisp iceberg lettuce and vine-ripened tomatoes.

Ingredients: 100% Angus Beef, Brioche Bun, Lettuce, Tomato, Red Onion, Pickles, House Signature Sauce.

Allergens: Gluten, Eggs, Mustard.

Simple perfection. We take our classic beef patty and blanket it in thick, melted sharp cheddar cheese for that iconic savory finish.

Ingredients: Angus Beef, Sharp Cheddar, Brioche Bun, Lettuce, Tomato, Tomato Ketchup.

Allergens: Gluten, Dairy.

Twice the beef, twice the glory. This powerhouse features two hand-pressed patties and double layers of cheddar for a serious protein hit.

Ingredients: Two Angus Beef Patties, Double Cheddar Cheese, Diced Onions, Pickles, Yellow Mustard.

Allergens: Gluten, Dairy, Mustard.

The heavy lifter. Three juicy beef patties stacked high with triple cheese and drizzled in our secret 'Boss' sauce for the ultimate indulgence.

Ingredients: Three Angus Beef Patties, Triple Cheddar, Special Boss Sauce, Lettuce, Tomato, Sautéed Onions.

Allergens: Gluten, Dairy, Eggs, Mustard.

A smoky masterpiece. Topped with thick-cut applewood smoked bacon and a tangy BBQ mayo that perfectly complements the charred beef.

Ingredients: Angus Beef, Applewood Smoked Bacon, Aged Cheddar, BBQ Mayo, Crispy Onions.

Allergens: Gluten, Dairy, Eggs.

Turn up the heat! Infused with fiery jalapeños and topped with melting pepper jack cheese, this burger packs a punch in every bite.

Ingredients: Spicy Seasoned Beef, Jalapeño Slices, Pepper Jack Cheese, Chipotle Aioli, Green Leaf Lettuce.

Allergens: Gluten, Dairy, Eggs.

Light, lean, and flavorful. A succulent grilled chicken breast marinated in herbs, paired with creamy Swiss cheese and fresh avocado.

Ingredients: Marinated Chicken Breast, Swiss Cheese, Avocado, Mayo, Romaine Lettuce.

Allergens: Gluten, Dairy, Eggs.

100% plant-based, 100% delicious. A savory beet-and-pea protein patty topped with vegan cheese and a refreshing lime-avocado spread.

Ingredients: Plant-based Patty, Vegan Cheddar, Avocado Spread, Sprouts, Tomato, Vegan Bun.

Allergens: Gluten (Optional GF Bun available), Soy.
